snippet.title: "Murder" Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming 21/10/15
http://www.petermoorhead.com/murder

A short story told in the form of a classic point and click adventure, an experience that prides itself on environmental storytelling and confident, cinematic flair. Heavily inspired by the works of Masamune Shirow, Katsuhiro Otomo, Neal Stephenson, and other cyberpunk greats, Murder aims to be a fresh, but familiar take on the setting.
